brief.brief: The report detail form to display values of database fields.
The name of the form must be in the format: "report name" appended with ".detail".

detail.detail: The report detail form comprises the input fields, positioned in a columnar arrangement immediately beneath the corresponding headings.
The names of the input fields must reflect the exact names used in the respective database tables or variables that are defined through Format Control or Totals Parameters definitions.
You can use the same detail form for multiple reports.
This is a keyed field (no nulls).
